startUrls.title: Repositories or Users to Scan
startUrls.description: Enter GitHub Repo URLs (to scan one) or User Profile URLs (to scan all their public repos). Examples: https://github.com/facebook/react or https://github.com/apify

maxReposPerUser.title: Max Repos (Profile Scan)
maxReposPerUser.description: Limit how many repos to scan when a User Profile URL is provided. Set to 0 for unlimited.

githubToken.title: GitHub Token (Optional)
githubToken.description: Provide a Personal Access Token (PAT) to increase API rate limits from 60 to 5000 requests/hour. Required for private repositories.

minHealthScore.title: Minimum Score Filter
minHealthScore.description: Only output results scoring above this threshold (0-100). Set to 0 to include all results.
